txt.en: You have discovered the top of the head from the statue of Helgi Goblinbane.

'What's this now? The helm from a Helgi Goblinbane statue! Hammer and tongs, he was in many of my favourite stories when I was but a young dwarf! The Tale of Helgi's Hammer... Goblinbane's Gilded Helm... The Lay of the Goblin-rout... Helgi and the Maiden's Beard-ribbons! Ah, such fine tales!\n\n'I have heard that Uxi in the Chamber of the Cross-roads endeavours to find and reassemble all of the pieces of the statue. I will have this delivered to him at once.'
You found a missing piece from the statue of Helgi Goblinbane -- the top of his head.
Bring the statue-piece to Simbi in the Twenty-first Hall
Simbi is in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou have found a piece of the shattered statue of Helgi Goblinbane, and should bring it to a dwarf who will deliver it to Uxi.
